greetings: Good day, {user}! How may I be of assistance? :bird:

userCommands.error: Couldn't create command! Use unique names. No spaces and special characters are allowed!

settings.title: Information
settings.description:
Settings can be changed in the `config.json` file.
Type `!help <command>` to get the information on how to use the command.

commandsHelp.helpNotFound: {user} Couldn't find any info for this command! :sob:
commandsHelp.help: {user} Display all settings, commands & info with `!help`
commandsHelp.tweet:
{user} You can write a tweet: `!announce This is a tweet! :bird:`
Share the latest tweet to all announcement channels: `!ann latest`
Share a specific tweet: `!tweet get <linkToTheTweet>` | **Requires Moderator!**
commandsHelp.ask: {user} Ask {bot} whatever you want and he'll answer: `!ask Will I ever be the PVP King?`
commandsHelp.cmd: {user} `!cmd` handles user-created commands. `!cmd create <command>|<title>|<some text>` creates a new command. Example: `!cmd create dog|Dog|Cats are the best!` will create a command `?dog`. Use `!cmd delete <command>` to remove an user-created command. | **Requires Moderator!**
